sentences.sContent: The President chose loyal supporters to serve in his cabinet.
sentences.sContent_eng: The President chose loyal supporters to serve in his cabinet.
sentences.sCn: 总统选择了忠诚的支持者到他的内阁服务。

sentences.sContent: Every year we used the State of the Union as an organizing tool for the cabinet and staff to come up with new policy ideas, and then we worked hard on how best to present them.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every year we used the State of the Union as an organizing tool for the cabinet and staff to come up with new policy ideas, and then we worked hard on how best to present them.
sentences.sCn: 每年国情咨文都被内阁和幕僚们作为我们提出新政策思路的一个组织工具，然后我们努力下功夫，让它们以最佳方式呈现在人们面前。

synos.tran: 内阁；[家具]橱柜；展览艺术品的小陈列室

phrases.pCn: n. 政府首脑的参谋团；厨房的餐具柜
影子内阁；（政府首脑挑选的）顾问团
壁橱，壁柜；嵌墙绸，墙面柜

remMethod.val: cabin (小屋) + et (小) → 陈列柜； 贮藏橱

trans.tranOther: the politicians with important positions in a government who meet to make decisions or advise the leader of the government
